languages.text: "Наконец-то, малыш, в тебе прорезалось хоть что-то от отца. Денз не стал бы церемониться с соперниками. Отстрелить голову и дело с концом! В общем, я согласен на предложение". {n}Головорез наставляет на вас оружие.{/n} "Тайно убить не вышло, убьем просто так. В конце концов, это Футфол! Прощайте, {mf|господин|госпожа} Фиделио".

traits.locale_text: "Наконец-то, малыш, в тебе прорезалось хоть что-то от отца. Денз не стал бы церемониться с соперниками. Отстрелить голову и дело с концом! В общем, я согласен на предложение". {n}Головорез наставляет на вас оружие.{/n} "Тайно убить не вышло, убьем просто так. В конце концов, это Футфол! Прощайте, {mf|господин|госпожа} Фиделио".

languages.text: "Finally, boy, you're showing some signs of being your father's son. Denz would never beat around the bush with rivals. Shoot their head off and be done with it! Anyway, I accept your proposal." {n}He aims his weapon at you.{/n} "We've tried killing you quietly, that didn't work out, so we'll just kill you, plain and simple like. This is Footfall, for Throne's sake! Bye-bye, Fidelio."
languages.original_text: "Наконец-то, малыш, в тебе прорезалось хоть что-то от отца. Денз не стал бы церемониться с соперниками. Отстрелить голову и дело с концом! В общем, я согласен на предложение". {n}Головорез наставляет на вас оружие.{/n} "Тайно убить не вышло, убьем просто так. В конце концов, это Футфол! Прощайте, {mf|господин|госпожа} Фиделио".

traits.locale_text: "Finally, boy, you're showing some signs of being your father's son. Denz would never beat around the bush with rivals. Shoot their head off and be done with it! Anyway, I accept your proposal." {n}He aims his weapon at you.{/n} "We've tried killing you quietly, didn't work out, so we'll just kill you, plain and simple like. This is Footfall, for Throne's sake! Bye-bye, {mf|Master|Madam} Fidelio."

"Finally, boy, you're showing some signs of being your father's son. Denz would never beat around the bush with rivals. Shoot their head off and be done with it! Anyway, I accept your proposal." {n}He aims his weapon at you.{/n} "We've tried killing you quietly, didn't work out, so we'll just kill you, plain and simple like. This is Footfall, for Throne's sake! Bye-bye, {mf|Master|Madam} Fidelio."

"Finally, boy, you're showing some signs of being your father's son. Denz would never beat around the bush with rivals. Shoot their head off and be done with it! Anyway, I accept your proposal." {n}He aims his weapon at you.{/n} "We've tried killing you quietly, that didn't work out, so we'll just kill you, plain and simple like. This is Footfall, for Throne's sake! Bye-bye, Fidelio."

"Finally, boy, you're showing some signs of being your father's son. Denz would never beat around the bush with rivals. Shoot their head off and be done with it! Anyway, I accept your proposal." {n}He aims his weapon at you.{/n} "We've tried killing you quietly, that didn't work out, so we'll just kill you, plain and simple like. This is Footfall, for Throne's sake! Bye-bye, Fidelio."

"Finally, boy, you're showing some signs of being your father's son. Denz would never beat around the bush with rivals. Shoot their head off and be done with it! Anyway, I accept your proposal." {n}He aims his weapon at you.{/n} "We've tried killing you quietly, that didn't work out, so we'll just kill you, plain and simple like. This is Footfall, for Throne's sake! Bye-bye, Fidelio."

languages.text: “终于啊，孩子，你终于有点你父亲那股劲儿了。丹兹从来都不会和他的敌人绕弯子，直接把对面脑袋崩下来，一了百了！总之，我接受你的提议。”{n}他把武器对准了你。{/n}“我们试过悄悄地把你做掉，但没成功。所以我们就直接杀了你吧，简单粗暴。黄金王座在上，这里可是落脚港啊！永别了，菲迪奥。”
languages.original_text: "Finally, boy, you're showing some signs of being your father's son. Denz would never beat around the bush with rivals. Shoot their head off and be done with it! Anyway, I accept your proposal." {n}He aims his weapon at you.{/n} "We've tried killing you quietly, that didn't work out, so we'll just kill you, plain and simple like. This is Footfall, for Throne's sake! Bye-bye, Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: “终于啊，孩子，你终于有点你父亲那股劲儿了。丹兹从来都不会和他的敌人绕弯子，直接把对面脑袋崩下来，一了百了！总之，我接受你的提议。”{n}他把武器对准了你。{/n}“我们试过悄悄地把你做掉，但没成功。所以我们就直接杀了你吧，简单粗暴。黄金王座在上，这里可是落脚港啊！永别了，菲迪奥。”

languages.text: «Muchacho, por fin empiezas a parecerte en algo a tu padre. Denz no era de los que se andaban con rodeos con sus rivales. ¡Un tiro en la cabeza y listo! A lo que iba, acepto tu propuesta». {n}Te apunta con su arma.{/n} «Hemos intentado matarte con discreción y no ha funcionado, así que tendremos que matarte sin más. Por el Trono, ¡que estamos en Paso! Adiós, Fidelio».
languages.original_text: "Finally, boy, you're showing some signs of being your father's son. Denz would never beat around the bush with rivals. Shoot their head off and be done with it! Anyway, I accept your proposal." {n}He aims his weapon at you.{/n} "We've tried killing you quietly, that didn't work out, so we'll just kill you, plain and simple like. This is Footfall, for Throne's sake! Bye-bye, Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: «Muchacho, por fin empiezas a parecerte en algo a tu padre. Denz no era de los que se andaban con rodeos con sus rivales. ¡Un tiro en la cabeza y listo! A lo que iba, acepto tu propuesta». {n}Te apunta con su arma.{/n} «Hemos intentado matarte con discreción y no ha funcionado, así que tendremos que matarte sin más. Por el Trono, ¡que estamos en Paso! Adiós, Fidelio».

languages.text: 「やっと親父の子供らしくなってきたな。デンツだったらこんな回りくどいことはしねえ。頭をバン！と撃って終わりよ！まあいい、お前の話の乗った」{n}彼は武器をこちらに向けた。{/n}「静かに始末しようと思ったが、失敗したならしょうがねえ。さっさと殺させてもらうよ。これがフットフォールだ！じゃあな、フィデリオ」
languages.original_text: "Finally, boy, you're showing some signs of being your father's son. Denz would never beat around the bush with rivals. Shoot their head off and be done with it! Anyway, I accept your proposal." {n}He aims his weapon at you.{/n} "We've tried killing you quietly, that didn't work out, so we'll just kill you, plain and simple like. This is Footfall, for Throne's sake! Bye-bye, Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: 「やっと親父の子供らしくなってきたな。デンツだったらこんな回りくどいことはしねえ。頭をバン！と撃って終わりよ！まあいい、お前の話の乗った」{n}彼は武器をこちらに向けた。{/n}「静かに始末しようと思ったが、失敗したならしょうがねえ。さっさと殺させてもらうよ。これがフットフォールだ！じゃあな、フィデリオ」

languages.text: "Endlich zeigt Ihr Anzeichen, dass Ihr der Sohn Eures Vaters seid, Junge. Denz ist bei Rivalen immer sofort zur Sache gekommen. Kopf wegballern und Schluss! Jedenfalls nehme ich Euren Vorschlag an." {n}Er zielt mit seiner Waffe auf dich.{/n} "Wir haben versucht, Euch unauffällig umzubringen, das hat nicht geklappt, also legen wir Euch jetzt einfach so um. Immerhin ist das hier Footfall, beim Thron! Macht's gut, Fidelio."
languages.original_text: "Finally, boy, you're showing some signs of being your father's son. Denz would never beat around the bush with rivals. Shoot their head off and be done with it! Anyway, I accept your proposal." {n}He aims his weapon at you.{/n} "We've tried killing you quietly, that didn't work out, so we'll just kill you, plain and simple like. This is Footfall, for Throne's sake! Bye-bye, Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: "Endlich zeigt Ihr Anzeichen, dass Ihr der Sohn Eures Vaters seid, Junge. Denz ist bei Rivalen immer sofort zur Sache gekommen. Kopf wegballern und Schluss! Jedenfalls nehme ich Euren Vorschlag an." {n}Er zielt mit seiner Waffe auf dich.{/n} "Wir haben versucht, Euch unauffällig umzubringen, das hat nicht geklappt, also legen wir Euch jetzt einfach so um. Immerhin ist das hier Footfall, beim Thron! Macht's gut, Fidelio."

languages.text: « Tu commences enfin à te comporter comme le digne fils de ton père, petit. Quand il s'agissait de traiter avec ses rivaux, Denz ne tournait pas autour du pot. Ça non, il leur explosait la tête et on n'en parlait plus ! Bref, j'accepte ta proposition. » {n}Il pointe son arme vers vous.{/n} « On a essayé de vous tuer discrètement, mais comme ça n'a pas marché, on va se contenter de vous tuer, tout simplement. Pour l'amour du Trône, nous sommes à Castel, enfin ! Adieu, Fidélio. »
languages.original_text: "Finally, boy, you're showing some signs of being your father's son. Denz would never beat around the bush with rivals. Shoot their head off and be done with it! Anyway, I accept your proposal." {n}He aims his weapon at you.{/n} "We've tried killing you quietly, that didn't work out, so we'll just kill you, plain and simple like. This is Footfall, for Throne's sake! Bye-bye, Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: « Tu commences enfin à te comporter comme le digne fils de ton père, petit. Quand il s'agissait de traiter avec ses rivaux, Denz ne tournait pas autour du pot. Ça non, il leur explosait la tête et on n'en parlait plus ! Bref, j'accepte ta proposition. » {n}Il pointe son arme vers vous.{/n} « On a essayé de vous tuer discrètement, mais comme ça n'a pas marché, on va se contenter de vous tuer, tout simplement. Pour l'amour du Trône, nous sommes à Castel, enfin ! Adieu, Fidélio. »

languages.text: "Ha şöyle! Nihayet babanın oğlu olduğunu belli etmeye başladın. Denz, hasımlarına karşı lafı hiç gevelemezdi. Kafalarını uçurup meseleyi kökten çözerdi! Her neyse, teklifini kabul ediyorum." {n}Silahını sana doğrultuyor.{/n} "Seni sessizce öldürmeyi denedik, olmadı. O yüzden biz de işi doğrudan, basitçe yapacağız. Ne de olsa burası Binliman! Elveda Fidelio."
languages.original_text: "Finally, boy, you're showing some signs of being your father's son. Denz would never beat around the bush with rivals. Shoot their head off and be done with it! Anyway, I accept your proposal." {n}He aims his weapon at you.{/n} "We've tried killing you quietly, that didn't work out, so we'll just kill you, plain and simple like. This is Footfall, for Throne's sake! Bye-bye, Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: "Sonunda! Babanın oğlu olduğunu belli etmeye başladın. Denz, rakiplerine karşı lafı hiç gevelemezdi. Kafalarını uçur da bitir şu işi! Her neyse, teklifini kabul ediyorum." {n}Silahını sana doğrultuyor.{/n} "Seni sessizce öldürmeyi denedik ama işe yaramadı. Sade ve basit bir şekilde öldüreceğiz seni işte. Burası Binliman, Taht aşkına! Bay bay Fidelio."
